ygData.subject: Speaking of dragons...
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night we went for Lord Nagafen.  Success!  We got a book for our Palidan, Druid stick - Ally, Selo s Drums - Sylly, Scourge Hammer - Arif, GPK - not sure,
ygData.messageBody:
Last night we went for Lord Nagafen. Success! We got a book for our Palidan, Druid stick - Ally, Selo's Drums - Sylly, Scourge Hammer - Arif, GPK - not sure, Fire Emerald Ring - Ataras. Also, Crown of King Tranix, Mith Arms, Mask. Pretty nice haul for a change. We suffered 4 deaths on Nag and the fight was fun. He got out on to the bridge and fell off into the lava - ugh! We backed off quickly and he clambered out and fought on the far side of the bridge until he died.

I am pretty excited with Selos drums and will be giving them a good workout. Looks like PoF tonight - going to be a lot of hair standing on end and begining chanters I suspect <eg>.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 50 songs
... somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
